content: उपहन् {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To strike, smite; दडोपघातं गाः कालयति <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--2@} To waste, injure, destroy, kill; अनुपघ्नन् पितृद्रव्यं <ls>Ms. 9. 208</ls>; लंका चोपहनिष्यते <ls>Bk. 16. 12</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">5. 12</ls>; <ls>Bg. 3. 24.</ls> {@--3@} To thrust in or into. {@--4@} To err, mistake in reciting.
